name: Threat Group-1314 (G0028)
description: Enterprise techniques used by Threat Group-1314, ATT&CK group G0028 v1.0

techniques.comment: Threat Group-1314 actors spawned shells on remote systems on a victim network to execute commands.[1]
Threat Group-1314 actors used a victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, for lateral movement.[1]
Threat Group-1314 actors used a victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, for lateral movement.[1]
Threat Group-1314 actors used compromised credentials for the victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, to move laterally.[1]
